DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; SPOTLIGHT ; GESTURE OF FAITH
DOC.TEXT: After learning midfielder Stefan Effenberg had agreed to sell his story of his World Cup ouster to the German tabloids for an estimated 70 # 000 marks ( $ 38 # 000 ) , a competing German newspaper came_up with the following headline : " Effenberg : From Middle_Finger to Goldfinger. " Effenberg was sent home by the German team this week for making an obscene gesture to fans during a match against South_Korea at Dallas . CHRIS DUFRESNE
